title: Client Runtime Library for Microsoft AutoRest Generated Clients
summary: Provides HttpClient infrastructure for clients generated by AutoRest.
description:
Infrastructure for error handling, tracing, and HttpClient pipeline configuration. Required by client libraries generated using AutoRest. 
Supported Platforms:
  -   Portable Class Libraries
  -   .NET Framework 4.5
  -   Windows 8
  -   Windows Phone 8.1
  -   DotNet Core
